action.primary: Dispels Wind, promotes the movement of Qi, overcomes Dampness, unblocks the collaterals, invigorates the Blood, disperses Stasis, reduces swelling, resolves toxicity and stops pain.

indications: Wind-Damp Bi syndrome (painful obstruction), pain in the sinews and bones, scrofula, throat Bi, general pain (including pain from bulging disorders, abdominal pain, burns, traumatic pain and toothache), both internally and topically

contraindications: Overdose can lead to dizziness, abdominal pain and vomiting.
Do not use with sour foods.

notes: It treats cold, aching joints, cold limbs and knee pain.
Recently, it has been used as an ingredient in medical toothpaste for people with bleeding gums and gum inflammation.
This herb inhibits the growth of cancer cells.
Those with a toothache can rinse with the decoction.
there have been reports of abdominal pain, and diarrhea following ingestion of this herb. The fruit has caused dizziness, blurred vision and vomiting.
